options.A: A scenic mountain drive with winding roads
options.B: A luxurious beach resort with valet parking
options.D: A sophisticated city break with fine dining

questions.question: How many people do you typically travel with?

options.A: Just me or one other person
options.B: A small group of friends or family (2-4)
options.C: My whole family, including kids and gear (5+)

questions.question: What's most important to you in a car's interior?

options.A: Cutting-edge technology and a huge screen
options.B: The finest leather and wood trim
options.D: A sporty feel with carbon fiber accents

questions.question: How would you describe your driving style?

options.A: Spirited and engaging, I love corners
options.B: Relaxed and comfortable, it's about the journey
options.C: Confident and capable, on any terrain
options.D: Fast and powerful, I crave performance

questions.question: Which feature excites you the most?

options.A: A convertible top for open-air driving
options.B: A massive, powerful engine with a roaring exhaust
options.C: The latest driver-assistance and safety features
options.D: Maximum cargo space for all my equipment
